text: Jane Bryan (June 11, 1918 â€“ April 8, 2009) was an American actress. Her career began in 1936. Bryan was known for She retired in 1940 because she married a drugstore manager. She was known for her role in Brother Rat and in Brother Rat and a Baby. Bryan and her husband helped make Ronald Reagan run for President of the United States in 1980. She died in Pebble Beach California after a long illness ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1918 births Category:2009 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Hollywood
title: Jane Bryan
